title: New free champion rotation: Azir, Gnar, Twitch and more!

replies.body:
{{champion:22}} 60%  Slower bot lane movement
{{champion:268}} 90% less farming mid lane
{{champion:9}} 45% more surprises
{{champion:150}} 90% less farming top lane
{{champion:127}} 75% more accidentally ulting yourself instead of the enemy
{{champion:25}} 35% less moving at all bot lane
{{champion:35}} 65% more magic tricks
{{champion:27}} 75% more auto-kitin- OH MY GOD STOP F****** CHASING SINGED
{{champion:37}} 40% less dying bot lane to even out the lack of movement
{{champion:29}} the other 65% more surprises

And 100% of statistics are still made up on the spot.
110%? That's a bit... surprising.......

My math skills are... Surprisingly sub-par when I'm running on 5 hours of sleep.

Consider the extra 10% a birthday present. We'll give it to you at your... Surprise party.
the other 10 percent is the surprise

First rule of League: The longer Garen has been MIA the higher the probability he is in that bush you are about to face check.

Rule Two of League: Don't chase singed.

Rule Three of League: NO REALLY DON'T CHASE SINGED!!
more like {{champion:268}} 90% of players trying to kill soldier
Wait!? Shouldn't Ao Shin be free this week?! :(
whos Ao Shin?
exactly
a champ dat looks like a dragon,riot may not even release the poor thing,it was suppose to be released alot sooner
Omg, it is going to be released, they just didn't have the time to, its like URF all over again...
But Ao Shin is just a new born. Let him grow with his brother Jarvan 5

{{champion:117}} Wait... this doesn't taste...

*Lulu has been slained*

{{champion:27}} Muahahaha!
{{champion:117}} *Uses revive*
{{champion:30}} *R* Ha btch please
{{item:3157}} HA Surprise mothafucka

James, what happens when you Chase Singed? 
You die Muthafucka!
What happens when Shen does his Ultimate?
Surprise Muthafucka!

What happens when rito releases new skins?
Heart-eyes Muthafucka!

{{champion:84}} SURPRISE MUTHERPUCKER!
Riot made ashe free to play because 99.99% of the league community cannot afford buying her.
I'm gonna stay away from League this week due to my uncommon case of Shacophobia.
Good rotation this week. I only have Ashe and Morgana. Be afraid, my future teammates, for my crappy Azir playing will be your downfall.
Also Rito, lower the difficulty rating on fiddlesticks. My lvl 9 friend spams fiddlesticks and says "He's easier than Zed"
zed is hard tho
Can't wait to play Zed and pown these noob Lissandras.
Lissandra counters Zed -.-....
good i hope you meet my talon, mwahahahahahaha
what about {{champion:6}} ..... :(
Urgot to be kidding me

{{champion:37}} 

You're gonna be in for great disappointment.  6 months, 21 nerfs, 0 f***s given by Riot.

So I've read. 
I'e only been playing since about Novemberish, and I've heard that so many great champs have been nerfed to hell.
I really wish people would stop complaining about how Sona keeps getting nerfs. As a Sona main I can tell you that she is still very strong. Just need to build her the right way.

As a Sona main myself, I can tell you objectively that she's arguably the weakest champion in the entire League now.  Which shouldn't be a surprise to anyone after 21 (twenty-one) nerfs in a matter of only months.
{{champion:37}}   True.
Morgana has lvl 1 difficulty?? Rito plz
**lvl one :D hahahahaha man they should fix that**. I still wish {{champion:37}} was stronger. They made her so weak...
My first skin was Arcade {{champion:37}} . The first champion I main was {{champion:37}} The first champion I played in URF was {{champion:37}}  When's URF going to come back?

She WAS stronger, and then they nerfed the living daylights outta her. I mained her from early on in my League career.

She's still fun though.
Well that's what I meant...
Dang, now shacos free? as if seeing him every 2 or 3 games lately wasnt bad enough D:

{{champion:27}} This champion tells you:
We can win without "fighting" 8D
